mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gap_reviews (user_id, title, major, content, grade, gap_period_months, isMajor) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{major}, #{content}, #{grade}, #{gapPeriodMonths}, #{isMajor})
mapper.select: SELECT gr.* FROM gap_reviews gr JOIN gap_review_bookmarks bm ON gr.gap_reviews_id = bm.gap_reviews_id WHERE bm.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM gap_review_bookmarks WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND gap_reviews_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gap_review_bookmarks WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND gap_reviews_id = #{reviewId}

SELECT gr.* FROM gap_reviews gr LEFT JOIN ( SELECT gap_reviews_id, COUNT(*) AS bookmark_count FROM gap_review_bookmarks GROUP BY gap_reviews_id ) bc ON gr.gap_reviews_id = bc.gap_reviews_id ORDER BY IFNULL(bc.bookmark_count, 0) DESC, gr.created_at DESC
